page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: A typical week-end My name is Jackie Brumpton and I am 10 years old.I live at Normanby-le-Wold.My father works at Acre farm and we live in a farm cottage.On Saturdays I go shopping with my mum,watch T.V. and play with my younger sister,Helen.I help my mum make the dinner.On a Sunday I like to ride my bike.Every Sunday evening my uncle Kevin and his family come from Caistor to visit us. I live on the top of a hill and from my bedroom window ,I can see the village of Claxby and,on a clear day,Lincoln Cathedral and the Humber Bridge.
